data.title: The official "Help me find this song"-thread
data.text:
Eee

Sweden2712 Posts

I searched for it, but didnt find one so I'm going to start an "Help me find this song"-thread were people can help out each other find the name for songs etc.

It happens to a lot of us sometimes that we hear a song and memorize a bit of the lyric but either somehow memorize it wrong or google dosent find a match. Sometimes we see a musicvideo or a commerical, and try to find it trough what we remember of it.

Obviously i started this thread because in the last couple of years this has been a song that has been bugging me, and I dont know the name of it. It used to be on MTV all the time in the 90s (I was a kid back then, so i dont really remember a lot). It was kind of an really melancholic song with a looped piano beat (it was kind of an electronic song) and if I remember correctly the video had this little girl sitting in a car and looking out from her window.

If recall correctly this was shown on the at the same time as songs like "Beastie Boys - Intergalactic" and "Daft Punk - Around the World" (I might be wrong though!)

Can someone help me?

[UoN]Sentinel

United States11320 Posts

TL I need your help as well. I've been trying to find this one pop song, I think I heard it first May of 2011 and a few times after that, then when I started trying to look for it it disappeared.

Female singer, all I remember (and this is the part that got me looking) was the melody:

A, A, G, F, E, D-E-F-E-D repeated 4 times.

Chord progression was Bb, Gm, Dm, F if I remember correctly.

No distinct lyrics, just female vocals. And here's a hastily assembled wav of the melody, at least what I think it sounds like

http://www.mediafire.com/?vehnq155a522vr2
